Oxford
Your statement should be written in English and explain your motivation for applying for the course at Oxford, your relevant experience and education, and the specific areas that interest you and/or you intend to specialise in. Please also give an indication of the area of your intended research project.

If possible, please ensure that the word count is clearly displayed on the document.

This will be assessed for your reasons for applying to this particular MPhil programme; evidence of motivation for and understanding of the proposed area of study; the ability to present a reasoned case in English; the academic attributes that you will bring to the programme; the skills that you hope to gain from the MPhil; commitment to the subject; and the relevance of the MPhil to your future career development plans.

Your statement should focus on your academic objectives and purposes rather than personal achievements, interests and aspirations.

It will be normal for your ideas subsequently to change in some ways as you investigate the evidence and develop your project. You should nevertheless make the best effort you can to demonstrate the extent of your research question, sources and method at this moment.

https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses/mphil-politics-european-politics-and-society

LSE
For each programme you apply for, you must upload a statement that describes your academic interest in, understanding of, and suitability for that programme, as well as your purpose and objectives in undertaking this graduate study. The statement of academic purpose is an important part of your application, and selectors are looking for evidence of your academic motivation and suitability, and of what you can contribute to the programme.

If you are applying for two programmes, please submit a separate statement of academic purpose for each programme.

Your statement(s) should be typed and no longer than two sides of A4 paper. There is no fixed word limit, but we expect statement(s) to be no longer than 1,000 - 1,500 words.

In your statement(s), you may wish to discuss the following:

- Motivation for undertaking the programme(s)
- Academic interests, strengths and background relevant to the programme(s)
- Areas of specific interest within the programme(s)
- Academic ambitions and/or research interests related to the programme(s)
- Any professional aspirations, and how academic work within the programme(s) might help you realise such aspirations
- Other relevant information, such as additional reading or research, work or other relevant experience that has informed your decision to apply for the particular programme(s)

https://www.lse.ac.uk/study-at-lse/Graduate/Prospective-students/Supporting-documents/Statement-of-academic-purpose

UCL
When we assess your application we would like to learn:

why you want to study Democracy and Comparative Politics at graduate level
why you want to study Democracy and Comparative Politics at UCL
what particularly attracts you to this programme
how your personal, academic and professional background meets the demands of a challenging and truly international academic environment
where you would like to go professionally with your degree
Together with essential academic requirements, the personal statement is your opportunity to illustrate whether your reasons for applying to this programme match what the programme will deliver.

replies.msg:
我知你講緊CS，Assume你係想報US CS Taught master。費事俾上面班友又話我放流料，又話咩research master第二個講法之類blablabla。

做幾年嘢不如直接fg報，cs master競爭只會越黎越大，過多幾年更加大，不如早報早上岸。MNC工作經驗有小小加成，但你過幾年之後再R professor寫reference已經會令reference強度減少（除非你同prof真係好熟）

FG黎講US top 30 CS master睇GPA+Intern，GRE無咩用，toefl過線有105就得（S，W大過24）。Reference有美國connection對top 10幫助都大。

Taught master黎講唔需要pub，除非你係報CMU MSCV/MSML/MSAI，因為AI同CV關係雖然MSCV係professional master距都prefer你有research底。

但even top至Stanford MSCS都唔需要pub。有都無壞，無都唔會拒諸門外。

top cs taught master應該係
1st class：Stanford MSCS，CMU MSCS/MSCV/MSML/MSAI
2st class：UCB MEng in EECS（MSc in EECS唔收外國人，多數收自己ucberkely嘅人），Cornell Meng CS，Cornell Tech，UIUC，CMU MSIN都OK。Yale MSCS勉強算呢個class，given Yale fame太大
3rd class：UCSD，UCLA，Columbia，UPenn （MCIT收無cs底嘅人，所以可以ignore upenn）
4th class：UChicago（MPCS），Rice，NYU Courant，USC，Dartmouth
保底NEU，NYU Tandon，SJSU呢類

1st class就爆4級gpa+strong interns（幾個mnc related research/tech interns）+爆高gre toefl+strong references，最好係美國教授推薦，例如exchange時R
2st class已經就3.8左右+好interns+ookk toefl+lcoal reference都得，gre其實唔係太重要again，不過1 st class入面d人實在太全面，純粹個個都真係好高。
3rd class同上

帶定頭盔：可能有漏，但理工科GPA嘅參考價值遠遠大過文科

其他mit，Princeton，cit呢類無cs taught master好似，harvard都無，得ds同cse。

唔該師兄

我知你講緊CS，Assume你係想報US CS Taught master。費事俾上面班友又話我放流料，又話咩research master第二個講法之類blablabla。

做幾年嘢不如直接fg報，cs master競爭只會越黎越大，過多幾年更加大，不如早報早上岸。MNC工作經驗有小小加成，但你過幾年之後再R professor寫reference已經會令reference強度減少（除非你同prof真係好熟）

FG黎講US top 30 CS master睇GPA+Intern，GRE無咩用，toefl過線有105就得（S，W大過24）。Reference有美國connection對top 10幫助都大。

Taught master黎講唔需要pub，除非你係報CMU MSCV/MSML/MSAI，因為AI同CV關係雖然MSCV係professional master距都prefer你有research底。

但even top至Stanford MSCS都唔需要pub。有都無壞，無都唔會拒諸門外。

top cs taught master應該係
1st class：Stanford MSCS，CMU MSCS/MSCV/MSML/MSAI
2st class：UCB MEng in EECS（MSc in EECS唔收外國人，多數收自己ucberkely嘅人），Cornell Meng CS，Cornell Tech，UIUC，CMU MSIN都OK。Yale MSCS勉強算呢個class，given Yale fame太大
3rd class：UCSD，UCLA，Columbia，UPenn （MCIT收無cs底嘅人，所以可以ignore upenn）
4th class：UChicago（MPCS），Rice，NYU Courant，USC，Dartmouth
保底NEU，NYU Tandon，SJSU呢類

1st class就爆4級gpa+strong interns（幾個mnc related research/tech interns）+爆高gre toefl+strong references，最好係美國教授推薦，例如exchange時R
2st class已經就3.8左右+好interns+ookk toefl+lcoal reference都得，gre其實唔係太重要again，不過1 st class入面d人實在太全面，純粹個個都真係好高。
3rd class同上

帶定頭盔：可能有漏，但理工科GPA嘅參考價值遠遠大過文科

其他mit，Princeton，cit呢類無cs taught master好似，harvard都無，得ds同cse。

quote.msg:
師兄知唔知美帝top 30甚至top 10大概係咩requirement? 上網穩啲人話要UG出top conference先有taught master讀 亦有人講GPA 3.8+, GRE 330+, TOEFL 105+就得
同埋唔知MNC工作經驗有幾幫到application, 諗緊好唔好係香港做幾年野先
唔該師兄

我知你講緊CS，Assume你係想報US CS Taught master。費事俾上面班友又話我放流料，又話咩research master第二個講法之類blablabla。

做幾年嘢不如直接fg報，cs master競爭只會越黎越大，過多幾年更加大，不如早報早上岸。MNC工作經驗有小小加成，但你過幾年之後再R professor寫reference已經會令reference強度減少（除非你同prof真係好熟）

FG黎講US top 30 CS master睇GPA+Intern，GRE無咩用，toefl過線有105就得（S，W大過24）。Reference有美國connection對top 10幫助都大。

Taught master黎講唔需要pub，除非你係報CMU MSCV/MSML/MSAI，因為AI同CV關係雖然MSCV係professional master距都prefer你有research底。

但even top至Stanford MSCS都唔需要pub。有都無壞，無都唔會拒諸門外。

top cs taught master應該係
1st class：Stanford MSCS，CMU MSCS/MSCV/MSML/MSAI
2st class：UCB MEng in EECS（MSc in EECS唔收外國人，多數收自己ucberkely嘅人），Cornell Meng CS，Cornell Tech，UIUC，CMU MSIN都OK。Yale MSCS勉強算呢個class，given Yale fame太大
3rd class：UCSD，UCLA，Columbia，UPenn （MCIT收無cs底嘅人，所以可以ignore upenn）
4th class：UChicago（MPCS），Rice，NYU Courant，USC，Dartmouth
保底NEU，NYU Tandon，SJSU呢類

1st class就爆4級gpa+strong interns（幾個mnc related research/tech interns）+爆高gre toefl+strong references，最好係美國教授推薦，例如exchange時R
2st class已經就3.8左右+好interns+ookk toefl+lcoal reference都得，gre其實唔係太重要again，不過1 st class入面d人實在太全面，純粹個個都真係好高。
3rd class同上

帶定頭盔：可能有漏，但理工科GPA嘅參考價值遠遠大過文科

其他mit，Princeton，cit呢類無cs taught master好似，harvard都無，得ds同cse。

我都想問下
我諗住比多年機會自己，唔得就報bachelor
知唔知oregon state既cs post bacc風評係點？
見佢排名都高唔低，而且專收non-cs major既人好似for轉職幾好
（我唔洗工作簽證所以唔一定要入大公司）

replies.msg:
OregonState CS ug alum經過,巴打竟然有聽過OSU

EECS某部份instructors 係有料，教得好，講緊係專科堂(Cyber Sec, AI, HCI etc) 如果你有心學, 佢地好多office hour, 有 D 差唔多係 247 discord standby.
CS basic core (Eg OS1, Algorithm ) 既instructors 真係 80%伏,大部分都係MS /PHD student黎教(好多 Indian 同 Middle East既)
如果巴打係0 CS底既可能會辛苦少少
雖然唔係好勁既學校,但係好多grad左都直接去 Intel, HP ,Garmin等等

我知你講緊CS，Assume你係想報US CS Taught master。費事俾上面班友又話我放流料，又話咩research master第二個講法之類blablabla。

做幾年嘢不如直接fg報，cs master競爭只會越黎越大，過多幾年更加大，不如早報早上岸。MNC工作經驗有小小加成，但你過幾年之後再R professor寫reference已經會令reference強度減少（除非你同prof真係好熟）

FG黎講US top 30 CS master睇GPA+Intern，GRE無咩用，toefl過線有105就得（S，W大過24）。Reference有美國connection對top 10幫助都大。

Taught master黎講唔需要pub，除非你係報CMU MSCV/MSML/MSAI，因為AI同CV關係雖然MSCV係professional master距都prefer你有research底。

但even top至Stanford MSCS都唔需要pub。有都無壞，無都唔會拒諸門外。

top cs taught master應該係
1st class：Stanford MSCS，CMU MSCS/MSCV/MSML/MSAI
2st class：UCB MEng in EECS（MSc in EECS唔收外國人，多數收自己ucberkely嘅人），Cornell Meng CS，Cornell Tech，UIUC，CMU MSIN都OK。Yale MSCS勉強算呢個class，given Yale fame太大
3rd class：UCSD，UCLA，Columbia，UPenn （MCIT收無cs底嘅人，所以可以ignore upenn）
4th class：UChicago（MPCS），Rice，NYU Courant，USC，Dartmouth
保底NEU，NYU Tandon，SJSU呢類

1st class就爆4級gpa+strong interns（幾個mnc related research/tech interns）+爆高gre toefl+strong references，最好係美國教授推薦，例如exchange時R
2st class已經就3.8左右+好interns+ookk toefl+lcoal reference都得，gre其實唔係太重要again，不過1 st class入面d人實在太全面，純粹個個都真係好高。
3rd class同上

帶定頭盔：可能有漏，但理工科GPA嘅參考價值遠遠大過文科

其他mit，Princeton，cit呢類無cs taught master好似，harvard都無，得ds同cse。
